pages.text: Want to pre-knap a tool head before knowing what it'll be? Try a multitool! This stone tool head can be crafted into any tool, depending on the orientation of the stick and the multitool head in the crafting grid.

Tools crafted using a multitool head cannot also have a $(l:tfc:better_stone_age/tool_bindings)tool binding$(). A tool crafted with a multitool head was built for a specific task, and rarely lasts much beyond that task.
A multitool head can also be crafted into a knife head. Unlike other tools crafted with multitool heads, knives can have bindings like normal.
